talentList.name: Deep Wounds
talentList.description: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing v0% of your melee weapon's average damage over 6 sec.

talentList.name: Sword Specialization
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hitting your target with your Sword.  This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

talentList.name: Improved Heroic Strike
talentList.description: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by v0 rage point.

talentList.name: Mace Specialization
talentList.description: Your attacks with maces ignore up to v0% of your opponent's armor.

talentList.name: Improved Charge
talentList.description: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge ability by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Rend
talentList.description: Increases the bleed damage done by your Rend ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Tactical Mastery
talentList.description: You retain up to an additional v0 of your rage points when you change stances.  Also greatly increases the threat generated by your Bloodthirst and Mortal Strike abilities when you are in Defensive Stance.

talentList.name: Improved Hamstring
talentList.description: Gives your Hamstring ability a v0% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

talentList.name: Deflection
talentList.description: Increases your Parry chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Overpower
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Poleaxe Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike and the critical damage caused with Axes and Polearms by v0%.

talentList.name: Sweeping Strikes
talentList.description: Your next 5 melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.

talentList.name: Weapon Mastery
talentList.description: Reduces the chance for your attacks to be dodged by v0% and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by v1%.  This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

talentList.name: Mortal Strike
talentList.description: A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 85 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.

talentList.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Anger Management
talentList.description: Generates 1 rage per 3 seconds.

talentList.name: Iron Will
talentList.description: Reduces the duration of all Stun and Charm effects used against you by v0%.

talentList.name: Impale
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Endless Rage
talentList.description: You generate 25% more rage from damage dealt.

talentList.name: Sudden Death
talentList.description: Your melee hits have a v0% chance of allowing the use of Execute regardless of the target's health state.  In addition, you keep at least v1 rage after using Execute.

talentList.name: Second Wind
talentList.description: Whenever you are struck by a Stun or Immobilize effect you will generate v0 rage and v1% of your total health over 10 sec.

talentList.name: Blood Frenzy
talentList.description: Increases your melee attack speed by v0%.  In addition your Rend and Deep Wounds abilities also increase all physical damage caused to that target by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Mortal Strike
talentList.description: Increases the damage caused by your Mortal Strike ability by v0% and reduces the cooldown by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Trauma
talentList.description: Your melee critical strikes increase the effectiveness of Bleed effects on the target by v0% for 1 min.

talentList.name: Unrelenting Assault
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Overpower and Revenge abilities by v0 secs and increases the damage done by both abilities by v1%.  In addition, if you strike a player with Overpower while they are casting, their magical damage and healing will be reduced by v2% for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Strength of Arms
talentList.description: Increases your total Strength and Stamina by v0% and your Expertise by v1.

talentList.name: Bladestorm
talentList.description: Instantly Whirlwind up to 4 nearby targets and for the next 6 sec you will perform a whirlwind attack every 1 sec.  While under the effects of Bladestorm, you can move but cannot perform any other abilities but you do not feel pity or remorse or fear and you cannot be stopped unless killed.

talentList.name: Wrecking Crew
talentList.description: Your melee critical hits Enrage you, increasing all damage caused by v0% for 12 sec.  This effect does not stack with Enrage.

talentList.name: Taste for Blood
talentList.description: Whenever your Rend ability causes damage, you have a v0% chance of allowing the use of your Overpower ability for 9 sec.  1 charge.  This effect will not occur more than once every 6 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Slam
talentList.description: Decreases the swing time of your Slam ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Juggernaut
talentList.description: Your Charge ability is now usable while in combat, but the cooldown on Charge is increased by 5 sec. Following a Charge, your next Slam or Mortal Strike has an additional 25% chance to critically hit if used within 10 sec.

talentList.name: Commanding Presence
talentList.description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout and the health bonus of your Commanding Shout by v0%.

talentList.name: Enrage
talentList.description: Gives you a 30% chance to receive a v0% damage bonus for 12 sec after being the victim of a damaging attack.  This effect does not stack with Wrecking Crew.

talentList.name: Flurry
talentList.description: Increases your attack speed by v0% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

talentList.name: Cruelty
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Booming Voice
talentList.description: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Commanding Shout by v0%.

talentList.name: Unbridled Wrath
talentList.description: Gives you a chance to generate an additional rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

talentList.name: Piercing Howl
talentList.description: Causes all enemies within 10 yards to be Dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
talentList.description: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by v0%.

talentList.name: Death Wish
talentList.description: When activated you become enraged, increasing your physical damage by 20% but increasing all damage taken by 5%.  Lasts 30 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Cleave
talentList.description: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Bloodthirst
talentList.description: Instantly attack the target causing AP*50/100 damage.  In addition, the next 3 successful melee attacks will restore 1% of max health.  This effect lasts 8 sec.  Damage is based on your attack power.

talentList.name: Blood Craze
talentList.description: Regenerates v0% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.

talentList.name: Improved Berserker Rage
talentList.description: The Berserker Rage ability will generate v0 rage when used.

talentList.name: Improved Execute
talentList.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Execute ability by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Intercept
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Dual Wield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Whirlwind
talentList.description: Increases the damage of your Whirlwind ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Precision
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Berserker Stance
talentList.description: Increases Strength by v0% and reduces threat caused by v1% while in Berserker Stance.

talentList.name: Rampage
talentList.description: Increases ranged and melee critical hit chance of all party and raid members within 100 yds by 5%.

talentList.name: Intensify Rage
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Bloodrage, Berserker Rage, Recklessness and Death Wish abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Furious Attacks
talentList.description: Your normal melee attacks have a chance to reduce all healing done to the target by 25% for 10 sec.  This can stack up to 2 times.

talentList.name: Bloodsurge
talentList.description: Your Heroic Strike, Bloodthirst, and Whirlwind hits have a v0% chance of making your next Slam instant for 5 sec.

talentList.name: Titan's Grip
talentList.description: Allows you to equip two-handed axes, maces and swords in one hand.  While you have a two-handed weapon equipped in one hand, your physical damage done is reduced by 10%.

talentList.name: Heroic Fury
talentList.description: Removes any Immobilization effects and refreshes the cooldown of your Intercept ability.

talentList.name: Unending Fury
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Slam, Whirlwind and Bloodthirst abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Armored to the Teeth
talentList.description: Increases your attack power by v0 for every 108 armor value you have.

talentList.name: Anticipation
talentList.description: Increases your Dodge chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Toughness
talentList.description: Increases your armor value from items by v0% and reduces the duration of all movement slowing effects by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Thunder Clap
talentList.description: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap ability by v0 rage point and increases the damage by v1% and the slowing effect by an additional v2%.

talentList.name: Improved Bloodrage
talentList.description: Increases the rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Incite
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike, Thunder Clap and Cleave abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Puncture
talentList.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Sunder Armor and Devastate abilities by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Revenge
talentList.description: Increases damage of your Revenge ability by v0% and causes Revenge to strike an additional target for v1% damage.

talentList.name: Vigilance
talentList.description: Focus your protective gaze on a group or raid target, reducing their damage taken by 3% and transfers 10% of the threat they cause to you.  In addition, each time they are hit by an attack your Taunt cooldown is refreshed.  Lasts 30 min.  This effect can only be on one target at a time.

talentList.name: Gag Order
talentList.description: Gives your Shield Bash and Heroic Throw abilities a v0% chance to silence the target for 3 sec and increases the damage of your Shield Slam ability by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Disciplines
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shield Wall, Retaliation and Recklessness abilities by v0 secs.

talentList.name: Improved Disarm
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Disarm ability by v0 sec and causes the target to take an additional v1% damage while disarmed.

talentList.name: Concussion Blow
talentList.description: Stuns the opponent for 5 sec and deals 38/100*AP damage (based on attack power).

talentList.name: Last Stand
talentList.description: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum health for 20 sec.  After the effect expires, the health is lost.

talentList.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
talentList.description: Increases physical damage you deal when a one-handed melee weapon is equipped by v0%.

talentList.name: Shield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by v0% and has a v1% chance to generate 5 rage when a block, dodge, or parry occurs.

talentList.name: Improved Defensive Stance
talentList.description: While in Defensive Stance all spell damage is reduced by v0% and when you Block, Parry or Dodge an attack you have a v1% chance to become Enraged, increasing Physical damage caused by v2% for 12 sec.

talentList.name: Vitality
talentList.description: Increases your total Strength by v0%, Stamina by v1% and your Expertise by v2.

talentList.name: Shield Mastery
talentList.description: Increases your block value by v0% and reduces the cooldown of your Shield Block ability by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Focused Rage
talentList.description: Reduces the rage cost of your offensive abilities by v0.

talentList.name: Devastate
talentList.description: Sunder the target's armor causing the Sunder Armor effect.  In addition, causes 120% of weapon damage plus 58 for each application of Sunder Armor on the target.  The Sunder Armor effect can stack up to 5 times.

talentList.name: Safeguard
talentList.description: Reduces damage taken by the target of your Intervene ability by v0% for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Sword and Board
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Devastate ability by v0% and when your Devastate or Revenge ability deals damage it has a v1% chance of refreshing the cooldown of your Shield Slam ability and reducing its cost by 100% for 5 sec.

talentList.name: Shockwave
talentList.description: Sends a wave of force in front of the warrior, causing 75/100*AP damage (based on attack power) and stunning all enemy targets within 10 yards in a frontal cone for 4 sec.

talentList.name: Critical Block
talentList.description: Your successful blocks have a v0% chance to block double the normal amount and increases your chance to critically hit with your Shield Slam ability by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Warbringer
talentList.description: Your Charge, Intercept and Intervene abilities are now usable while in combat and in any stance.  In addition, your Intervene ability will remove all movement impairing effects.

talentList.name: Damage Shield
talentList.description: Whenever you take damage from or block a melee attack you cause damage equal to v0% of your block value.

talentList.name: Improved Spell Reflection
talentList.description: Reduces the chance you'll be hit by spells by v0% and when the ability is used it will reflect the first spell cast against the v1 closest party members within 20 yards.

major.name: Glyph of Enraged Regeneration
major.description: Your Enraged Regeneration ability heals for an additional 10% of your health over its duration.

major.name: Glyph of Intervene
major.description: Increases the number attacks you intercept for your Intervene target by 1.

major.name: Glyph of Spell Reflection
major.description: Reduces the cooldown on Spell Reflection by 1 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Bladestorm
major.description: Reduces the cooldown on Bladestorm by 15 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Shockwave
major.description: Reduces the cooldown on Shockwave by 3 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Devastate
major.description: Your Devastate ability now applies two stacks of Sunder Armor.

major.name: Glyph of Vigilance
major.description: Your Vigilance ability transfers an additional 5% of your target's threat to you.

major.name: Glyph of Blocking
major.description: Increases your block value by 10% for 10 sec after using your Shield Slam ability.

major.name: Glyph of Mortal Strike
major.description: Increases the damage of your Mortal Strike ability by 10%.

major.name: Glyph of Bloodthirst
major.description: Increases the healing you receive from your Bloodthirst ability by 100%.

major.name: Glyph of Whirlwind
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind by 2 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Sweeping Strikes
major.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Sweeping Strikes ability by 100%.

major.name: Glyph of Shield Wall
major.description: Reduces the cooldown on Shield Wall by 2 min, but Shield Wall now only reduces damage taken by 40%.

major.name: Glyph of Execution
major.description: Your Execute ability deals damage as if you had 10 additional rage.

major.name: Glyph of Cleaving
major.description: Increases the number of targets your Cleave hits by 1.

major.name: Glyph of Last Stand
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Last Stand ability by 1 min.

major.name: Glyph of Barbaric Insults
major.description: Your Mocking Blow ability generates 100% additional threat.

major.name: Glyph of Victory Rush
major.description: Your Victory Rush ability has a 30% increased critical strike chance.

major.name: Glyph of Revenge
major.description: After using Revenge, your next Heroic Strike costs no rage.

major.name: Glyph of Overpower
major.description: Adds a 100% chance to enable your Overpower when your attacks are parried.

major.name: Glyph of Sunder Armor
major.description: Your Sunder Armor ability affects a second nearby target.

major.name: Glyph of Taunt
major.description: Increases the chance for your Taunt ability to succeed by 8%.

major.name: Glyph of Hamstring
major.description: Gives your Hamstring ability a 10% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Resonating Power
major.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Thunder Clap ability by 5.

major.name: Glyph of Rending
major.description: Increases the duration of your Rend ability by 6 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Rapid Charge
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Charge ability by 7%.

major.name: Glyph of Heroic Strike
major.description: You gain 10 rage when you critically strike with your Heroic Strike ability.

minor.name: Glyph of Command
minor.description: Increases the duration of your Commanding Shout ability by 2 min.

minor.name: Glyph of Enduring Victory
minor.description: Increases the window of opportunity in which you can use Victory Rush by 5 sec.

minor.name: Glyph of Mocking Blow
minor.description: Increases the damage of your Mocking Blow ability by 25%.

minor.name: Glyph of Bloodrage
minor.description: Reduces the health cost of your Bloodrage ability by 100%.

minor.name: Glyph of Thunder Clap
minor.description: Increases the radius of your Thunder Clap ability by 2 yards.

minor.name: Glyph of Charge
minor.description: Increases the range of your Charge ability by 5 yards.

minor.name: Glyph of Battle
minor.description: Increases the duration of your Battle Shout ability by 2 min.
